snippet: The federation unveiled a plan that includes additional youth national teams, higher standards for coaches and programs for younger children.
abstract: United States Soccer Federation unveils latest plan to enhance American soccer development; proposal includes measures that will increase federation’s reach, including extending development programs to under-12 level, adding two youth national teams to fill in gaps in development system and raising standards for coaches across nation.
lead_paragraph: The federation unveiled a plan that includes additional youth national teams, higher standards for coaches and programs for younger children.

headline.main: Hoping to Fill Gaps, U.S. Soccer Expands Its Programs for Young Players
headline.print_headline: Hoping to Fill Gaps, U.S. Soccer Expands Its Programs for Young Players

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
